featured.text: In his resignation speech, he blamed his failings on the fact that he was blood type B. The blood-type craze, considered simply harmless fun by some Japanese, may manifest itself as prejudice and discrimination.
19 a stye can look unpleasant at times, it is usually harmless and doesn’t cause vision problems.

definition.zh_def: 無害的；不會造成傷害或危險的。
definition.en_def: Not causing or capable of causing harm; safe.
definition.example: The chemicals used in the experiment are harmless to humans.
